verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> which came unto <S%H6846>Zephaniah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3570>Cushi<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1436>Gedaliah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H568>Amariah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%>, in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H526>Amon<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.
I will <S%H622>utterly<s%> <S%H5486>consume<s%> all things from off the face of the <S%H6440>ground<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And I will stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and upon all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; and I will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal<s%> from this <S%H4725>place<s%>, and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3649>Chemarim<s%> with the <S%H3548>priests<s%>;

and them that <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> upon the <S%H1406>housetops<s%>; and them that <S%H7812>worship<s%>, that <S%H7650>swear<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> and <S%H7650>swear<s%> by <S%H4428>Malcam<s%>;
and them that are turned <S%H5472>back<s%> <S%H310>from<s%> following <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and those that have not <S%H1245>sought<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, nor inquired after <S%H1875>him<s%>.

Hold thy <S%H2013>peace<s%> at the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is at <S%H7138>hand<s%>: for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H3559>prepared<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>, he hath <S%H6942>consecrated<s%> his <S%H7121>guests<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>, that I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and all such as are <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H5237>foreign<s%> <S%H4403>apparel<s%>.

And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> all those that <S%H1801>leap<s%> over the <S%H4670>threshold<s%>, that <S%H4390>fill<s%> their <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H2555>violence<s%> and <S%H4820>deceit<s%>.

And in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, there shall be the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H6818>cry<s%> from the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and a <S%H3215>wailing<s%> from the <S%H4932>second<s%> <S%H1419>quarter<s%>, and a great <S%H7667>crashing<s%> from the <S%H1389>hills<s%>.

Wail <S%H3213><s%>, ye <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4389>Maktesh<s%>; for all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> are <S%H1820>undone<s%>; all they that were <S%H5187>laden<s%> with <S%H3701>silver<s%> are cut <S%H3772>off<s%>.

And it shall come to pass at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, that I will <S%H2664>search<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> with <S%H5216>lamps<s%>; and I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> that are <S%H7087>settled<s%> on their <S%H8105>lees<s%>, that <S%H559>say<s%> in their <S%H3824>heart<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will not do <S%H3190>good<s%>, neither will he do <S%H7489>evil<s%>.

And their <S%H2428>wealth<s%> shall become a <S%H4933>spoil<s%>, and their <S%H1004>houses<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%>: <S%H1129>yea<s%>, they shall build <S%H1004>houses<s%>, but shall not <S%H3427>inhabit<s%> <S%H5193>them<s%>; and they shall plant <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, but shall not <S%H8354>drink<s%> the wine <S%H3196>thereof<s%>.

The <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%>, it is <S%H7138>near<s%> and <S%H4118>hasteth<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%>, even the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; the mighty <S%H1368>man<s%> <S%H6873>crieth<s%> there <S%H4751>bitterly<s%>.

That <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5678>wrath<s%>, a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%> and <S%H4691>distress<s%>, a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7722>wasteness<s%> and <S%H4875>desolation<s%>, a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness<s%> and <S%H653>gloominess<s%>, a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6051>clouds<s%> and thick <S%H6205>darkness<s%>,
a <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> and <S%H8643>alarm<s%>, against the <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and against the <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H6438>battlements<s%>.

And I will bring <S%H6887>distress<s%> upon <S%H120>men<s%>, that they shall <S%H1980>walk<s%> like blind <S%H5787>men<s%>, because they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; and their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be poured <S%H8210>out<s%> as <S%H6083>dust<s%>, and their <S%H3894>flesh<s%> as <S%H1561>dung<s%>.

Neither their <S%H3701>silver<s%> nor their <S%H2091>gold<s%> shall be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> them in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>'s <S%H5678>wrath<s%>; but the whole <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%> by the <S%H784>fire<s%> of his <S%H7068>jealousy<s%>: for he will <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H926>end<s%>, yea, a terrible <S%H3617>end<s%>, of all them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.
